ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] dragon twisting
ygData.msgSnippet: sometimes i can keep 2 up, sometimes only 1, guess it depends on your system.  and we only take 30 to do nagafen, if you have more along the lines of 40-50 it
ygData.messageBody:
sometimes i can keep 2 up, sometimes only 1, guess it depends on your
system. and we only take 30 to do nagafen, if you have more along the lines
of 40-50 it is gonna be hard to twist 2 let alone 3. elemental rhythms is
most important. the second song is up to you, it does not have to be
guardian. with elemental and other classes resist buffs for fire and magic,
you will be doing well enough against the breath and fear. so you have the
choice of guardian, VoV, or Niv's for the 2nd song. i kinda like
elemental/Niv's myself, just seems right to me. little regen, little
strength, little magic damage absorption. not much of course, but with all
the tanks having haste item+augment to cap haste anyway, you don't need the
haste of VoV. bottom line though is elemental first, others much less
important.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L47 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> That being said, if I weezle into the prime nag group,
> has it been your experience to try and keep just
> guardian and elemental rhythms up or should I go for 3
> (I'm very good at twisting without queues so heavy lag
> won't hamper keeping 3 up 90% of the time). If 3,
> then what to add?
>
> Thanks,
> -Tork@Nameless
